metadata.title: CVE-2016-10375 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Yodl before 3.07.01 has a Buffer Over-read in the queue_push function in queue/queuepush.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10375` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

yodl - 3.08.01-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yodl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.08.01-1').
